passage_text: How much does massage therapy school cost? The cost of massage therapy school ranges between $6 to $17 per hour of education, with the average cost* around $9 to $10 per hour. This means if your state has no—or minimal—requirements, you can choose to take a shorter program, which will cost you less in massage therapy tuition.

1 On average, the hourly rate for tuition can range from $7 to $19 a hour. 2  For a 500 hour training course, the tuition can range from $3,500 to $10,000. 3  For example, a full program tuition for massage therapy school in the state of Oregon can be anywhere from $8,000 to $9,900.

Program Length and Massage School Tuition. One of the biggest factors in accounting for the huge range of massage therapy school tuition rates is the length of the program. Programs in some states may involve as little as 500 hours of education, while others may include 700 hours, 1,000 hours, or more.
